562:281: evamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayāmīti vācaṃ bhāṣeta- anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ bhavatviti|

562:283: sacetpariṇāmayan evaṃ samanvāharati-te dharmāḥ kṣīṇā niruddhā vigatā vipariṇatāḥ,
562:284: sa ca dharmo'kṣayo yatra pariṇāmyate ityevaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
562:287: evaṃ bhadantaṃ subhūte pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati|
562:289: tathā hi sa tāṃ pariṇāmanāṃ nābhiniviśate|
562:299: yadapyanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu tadapi viviktaṃ śāntamiti pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
562:300: sacedevamapi na saṃjānīte-sarvasaṃskārāḥ śāntā viviktā iti,
562:301: evamiyaṃ tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā yadapi tatteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ kuśalamūlam|
562:303: yenāpi tatpariṇāmitaṃ tadapi tajjātikaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ tannikāyaṃ tatsvabhāvam|
562:307: na hi buddhā bhagavanto nimittayogena pariṇāmanāmabhyanujānanti|
562:311: yacca nopalabhyate tannaiva nimittaṃ na viṣayaḥ|
562:314: atha smṛtivaikalyena na nimittīkaroti na samanvāharati na manasi karoti smṛtivaikalyādanavabodhādvā,
562:318: evaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati tatkuśalamūlaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
562:319: evamatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam-idaṃ tadbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalaṃ veditavyam|
562:322: atra copāyakauśalaṃ śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyameva prajñāpāramitā abhīkṣṇaṃ śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā paripraśnīkartavyā|
562:324: na hi prajñāpāramitāmanāgamya śakyeyamaśrutavatā prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmanākriyā praveṣṭum|
562:325: tatra ya evaṃ vadet-śakyamanāgamya prajñāpāramitāṃ tatpuṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitumiti,
562:331: api tu khalu punaḥ sa pudgalo nimittīkṛtya vikalpya ca yathābhūtamayathābhūte yathābhūtasaṃjñī upalambhamanupalambhe pariṇāmayet,
562:332: tasya kuśalamūlaṃ buddhā bhagavanta evaṃ pariṇāmitamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau nābhyanujānanti|
562:334: eṣa eva hi tasya mahānupalambho bhavati,
562:335: yatsa parinirvāṇamapi buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nimittīkaroti vikalpayati ca|
562:337: na copalambhasaṃjñinastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pariṇāmanāṃ mahārthakarīṃ vadanti|
562:340: tadyathāpi nāma praṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ saviṣaṃ bhavet,
562:341: kiṃ cāpi tadvarṇataśca gandhataśca rasataśca sparśataśca abhilaṣaṇīyaṃ bhavati,
562:342: api tu khalu punaḥ saviṣatvātparivarjanīyaṃ bhavati paṇḍitānām,
562:344: tadeva bālajātīyo duṣprajñajātīyaḥ puruṣaḥ paribhoktavyaṃ manyeta|
562:345: tasya tadbhojanaṃ paribhuñjānasya varṇatasya gandhataśca rasataśca sparśataśca svādeṣu sukhakaraṃ pariṇāme cāsya duḥkhavipākaṃ bhavati|
562:348: evameva ārya subhūte ihaike durgṛhītena durupalakṣitena duḥsvādhyātena subhāṣitasyārthamajānānā yathābhūtamarthamanavabudhyamānā evamavavadiṣyanti,
562:349: evamanuśāsiṣyanti-ehi tvaṃ kulaputra atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandham|
562:350: teṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ yaistatra teṣvatītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante'varopyante ca,
562:351: yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhito nāntardhāsyati nāntardadhāti ca,
562:352: etasminnantare teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yāvacca anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānām,
562:353: ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca,
562:354: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante'varopyante ca,
562:355: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca pratyekabodhau,
562:356: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante'varopyante ca,
562:357: ye ca śrāvakayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca śrāvakabodhau,
562:358: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante'varopyante ca,
562:359: yāni ca pṛthagjanānāmaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlamekato'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati|
562:360: evaṃ sa pariṇāmo nimittayogena pariṇāmyamāno viṣatvāya saṃpravartate,
562:370: kathaṃ ca pariṇāmitaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
562:371: ihānena bodhisattvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tathāgatamanabhyākhyātukāmena evaṃ tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlamanumoditavyamevaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yathā te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā buddhajñānena buddhacakṣuṣā jānanti paśyanti tatkuśalamūlaṃ yajjātikaṃ yannikāyaṃ yādṛśaṃ yatsvabhāvaṃ yallakṣaṇam|
562:372: yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyate tathā anumode tatkuśalamūlam,
562:373: yathā ca te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā abhyanujānanti pariṇāmyamānaṃ tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
562:375: evamanumodamāna evaṃ pariṇāmayan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'naparāddho bhavati|
562:376: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ samyaktvānumoditaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ ca bhavati tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye,
562:378: evaṃ cāsya pariṇāmo nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo mahāpariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ paripūrṇaḥ suparipūrṇo bhavati adhyāśayena adhimuktyā pariṇāmayataḥ||
562:379: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ pariṇāmayitavyam-yacchīlaṃ yaḥ samādhiryā prajñā yā vimuktiryadvimuktijñānadarśanaṃ tadyathā aparyāpannaṃ kāmadhātau aparyāpannaṃ rūpadhātau aparyāpannamārūīpyadhātau nāpyatītaṃ na anāgataṃ na pratyutpannam|
562:386: evaṃ pariṇāmayatastasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinaṣṭaḥ pariṇāmo bhavatyaparyāpanno nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo mahāpariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ paripūrṇaḥ suparipūrṇo bhavati|
562:390: anayā dharmadhātupariṇāmanayā yathā buddhā bhagavanto jānanti,
562:391: yathā cābhyanujānanti tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitamevaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatīti,
562:393: evaṃ ca pariṇāmitaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau||
562:394: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhu subhūte|
562:400: asyāmeva dharmatāyāṃ yathā buddhā bhagavanto jānanti paśyanti,
562:401: tatkuśalamūlaṃ yajjātikaṃ yannikāyaṃ yādṛśaṃ yatsvabhāvaṃ yallakṣaṇaṃ yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyate,
562:405: atra yaḥ puṇyaskandho yaśca gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvāḥ,
562:406: tān sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayetpratiṣṭhāpayet,
562:408: tato'yameva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmadhātupariṇāmajaḥ puṇyaskandho'gra ākhyāyate,
562:419: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
562:420: yāvantaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
562:421: te sarve caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhino bhaveyuḥ,
562:423: tato'yameva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāmanāsahagataḥ puṇyaskandho'gra ākhyāyate,
562:434: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ caturdhyānaniṣpādanasaṃbhūtaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
562:435: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
562:437: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu caturapramāṇalābhināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
562:438: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
562:440: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu caturārūpyasamāpattilābhināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
562:441: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
562:443: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu pañcābhijñānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
562:444: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu srotaāpannā bhaveyuḥ|
562:445: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
562:446: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
562:448: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ sakṛdāgāmināṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
562:449: yāvantaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
562:451: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāmanāgāmināṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
562:452: yāvantaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ te sarve arhanto bhaveyuḥ|
562:453: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāmarhatāṃ puṇyaskandhaḥ,
562:454: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
562:456: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ puṇyaskandhaḥ,
562:457: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
562:458: te sarve anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitā bhaveyuḥ|
562:459: ye sarve anyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvāḥ,
562:463: etena paryāyeṇa tān sarvasattvānekaikaṃ parikalpya tāṃśca sarvabodhisattvānekaiko bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpānupatiṣṭheccīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ,
562:465: evamekaikasteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanena paryāyeṇa dānaṃ dadyāt,
562:467: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te bodhisattvāstatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ?
562:472: saṃkhyāpi bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum,
562:473: gaṇanāpi upamāpi aupamyamapi upanisāpi upaniṣadapi bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum|
562:475: sa puṇyaskandho gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣvapi trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu na māyet||
562:477: yatra khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto'nena dharmadhātupariṇāmena tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
562:479: asya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya dharmadhātupariṇāmajasya asau pūrvaka upalambhasaṃjñināṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti,
562:480: sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭītamīmapi koṭīśatatamīmapi koṭīsahasratamīmapi koṭīśatasahasratamīmapi koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti,
562:481: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi aupamyamapi upanisāmapi upaniṣadamapi na kṣamate|
562:483: tathā hi teṣāṃ paurvakāṇāmupalambhasaṃjñināṃ bodhisattvānāṃ subahvapi dānaṃ dattaṃ subahvityapi parisaṃkhyātaṃ bhavati||
562:484: atha khalu cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ viṃśatisahasrāṇi prāñjalīni namasyanti bhagavantametadavocan-mahāpariṇāmo'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ kuśalamūlapariṇāmaḥ sarvajñatāyai,
562:485: yatra hi nāma teṣāmaupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tāvantaṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāramabhibhavati|
562:486: atha khalu trāyastriṃśakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ śatasahasrāṇi divyapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇavarṣairdivyai ratnavarṣairdivyaiśca vastravarṣairbhagavantamabhyavākirannabhiprākiran|
562:487: divyaiśchatrairdivyairdhvajairdivyābhirghaṇṭābhirdivyābhiḥ patākābhiḥ samantācca divyadīpamālābhirbahuvidhābhiśca divyābhiḥ pūjābhirbhagavantaṃ satkurvanti sma,
562:488: gurukurvanti sma mānayanti sma pūjayanti sma arcayanti sma apacāyanti sma,
562:490: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta-mahāpariṇāmo batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yo'yaṃ dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ,
562:491: yatra hi nāma tatteṣāmaupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraskandhamabhibhavati yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītatvādasya mahāpariṇāmasya|
562:492: evamanyebhyo'pi devanikāyebhyo devaputrā āgatya bhagavantaṃ parameṇa satkāreṇa parameṇa gurukāreṇa paramayā mānanayā paramayā pūjanayā paramayā arcanayā paramayā apacāyanayā satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā arcayitvā apacāyya evameva śabdamudīrayanti sma,
562:495: yāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāśca devāḥ,
562:496: te'pyevamevāñjaliṃ kṛtvā bhagavantaṃ namasyanta etadavocan-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ kuśalamūlapariṇāmaḥ,
562:497: yasteṣāmupalambhasaṃjñināṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tāvaccirarātrasaṃcitamamapi tathā mahāvistarasamudānītamapi puṇyaskandhamabhibhavati||
562:498: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān śuddhāvāsakāyikān devaputrānādīn kṛtvā sarvāṃstān devaputrānāmantrayate sma-tiṣṭhatu khalu punardevaputrā gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitānāmanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ pratilambhāya dānaṃ dadatāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ anena paryāyeṇa,
562:499: ye'pi te devaputrā anyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
